name: Law Enforcement Assistance Narcotics and Dangerous Drugs Training
objective: To acquaint appropriate professional and enforcement personnel with (1) techniques in the conduct of drug investigations; (2) aspects of physical security in legitimate drug distribution; (3) techniques in analysis of drugs for evidential purpose; (4) pharmacology, socio-psychological aspects of drug abuse, drug education, and; (5) management and supervisory training for drug unit Commanders.
applicant_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals
Specialized group (e.g. health professionals, students, veterans)
State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)
categories: Law, Justice, and Legal Services - Law Enforcement Support

authorizations.text: Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970.

gwo.gwo: Advance the Capabilities of the Forensic Sciences
